sentences.english: S. city has at least a half-dozen places where you can find a decent green chicken curry.
sentences.chinese: 今天，任何一个美国大城市能都找到正宗的绿咖喱鸡。

sentences.english: Stir in basil. Spoon curry over rice. Serve.
sentences.chinese: 拌入罗勒叶，把咖喱浇在饭上即可。

sentences.english: She serves this with duck and coconut milk curry.
sentences.chinese: 她的珍宝饭用了鸭子肉和椰奶咖喱。

sentences.english: This lime curry is particularly hot .
Kingfisher beer is popular wherever spicy curries are eaten.
sentences.chinese: 在所有咖喱饭盛行之处，都有翠丰啤酒的销路。

sentences.english: Add a little curry to your diet.
sentences.chinese: 给你的食谱上添加一点咖喱。

sentences.english: Since you don' t use any utensils to eat, you can use this bread to scoop up the curry or rice.
sentences.chinese: 你可以用面包来盛咖喱粉和米饭而省去了器皿。

sentences.english: Curries and Pancakes are famous in India.
sentences.chinese: 咖喱和薄饼在印度是出名的。

sentences.english: Roasted goose leg with red curry sauce.
Oxtail curry with rice, Portuguese inspired we think.
sentences.chinese: 牛尾咖喱和米饭，我们认为有葡萄牙菜的感觉。

sentences.english: We can make chicken, lamb, beef, shrimp, curries.
sentences.chinese: 我们有鸡，羊，牛，虾和咖喱。

sentences.english: Learn how to dice up vegetables for curry chicken in this free recipe video.
sentences.chinese: 了解如何注册蔬菜骰子在这个自由的咖喱鸡食谱影片。

sentences.english: I went straight home with my daughter and we ordered a curry.
sentences.chinese: 我和女儿径直回家，点了一份咖喱粉。

sentences.english: In December 2000, our first overseas franchisee opened their restaurant in Korea.
sentences.chinese: 蕉叶咖喱屋首间加盟店在2000年于韩国正式营业。

sentences.english: Afterwards, I'll cook us curry. Do you like it?
sentences.chinese: 阅读后我将亲自下厨做咖喱食物，你喜欢吗？

definition: laksa, spicy noodle soup of Southeast Asia
rice in gravy, typically with meat and vegetables
pasta (abbr. for 意大利麵|意大利面[Yi4 da4 li4 mian4])/(Tw) yi mein, a variety of Cantonese egg noodle
